fields.description: The Internal Application SPN of the application server. This SPN needs to be in the list of services to which the connector can present delegated credentials.
fields.name: KerberosServicePrincipalName

fields.description: The Delegated Login Identity for the connector to use on behalf of your users. For more information, see Working with different on-premises and cloud identities . Possible values are: userPrincipalName, onPremisesUserPrincipalName, userPrincipalUsername, onPremisesUserPrincipalUsername, onPremisesSAMAccountName.
fields.name: KerberosSignOnMappingAttributeType

fields.description: The OData ID of this entity
fields.name: ODataId

fields.description: The OData Type of this entity
fields.name: ODataType
